medical_history.chief_complaint: Fatigue lasting 1 month, increased frequency of urination, nocturia, and increased thirst over the past week.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms of fatigue began 1 month ago, with increasing urination, nighttime urination, and thirst developing over the previous week.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Anxiety, depression, hypercholesterolemia, seasonal allergies, hypogonadism, and gastroesophageal reflux disease. Recent upper respiratory tract infection treated with a 5-day course of azithromycin.
medical_history.family_history: Father died at age 50 from ischemic heart failure; three siblings with myocardial infarction. Mother lived to age 96. No other family medical history specified.
medical_history.social_history: Community college professor, married, non-smoker, consumes two cups of coffee and two shots of whisky daily.
